salaryExpectations: LKR 80,000 (Junior Developer) to LKR 650,000+ (Senior/Lead Developer) per month.
futureOutlook: The demand for skilled web and mobile developers is exceptionally high, driven by both local businesses needing a digital presence and the booming IT export industry. Full-stack developers who are proficient in both frontend and backend technologies are particularly valuable. This field offers immense opportunities for freelance and remote work.
